caption: Figure 3: Accuracy on biography generation under different numbers of generated claims.
description: The chart displays the accuracy of different models on a biography generation task in relation to the number of claims generated.

caption: Figure 4: Performance as the number of synthetic data scales up.
description: The chart displays the performance of QA and biography generation tasks with and without the prerequisite learning stage as the amount of synthetic data increases.

caption: Figure 5: The distribution of each response type with respect to the log of monthly page views of the entities.
description: The chart displays the distribution of three response types (certain, unsure, unknown) based on the log of monthly page views, indicating a correlation between response type and entity familiarity.

caption: Figure 3: Accuracy on biography generation under different numbers of generated claims.
description: The chart displays the accuracy of different methods (PREREQ-TUNE with GPT-4, PREREQ-TUNE with Llama, POPULAR, and SFT) on biography generation across varying numbers of generated claims.

caption: Figure 7: Accuracy on biography generation with two decomposition methods.
description: The chart displays the accuracy of biography generation models using two different methods for decomposing seed biographies into individual statements, showing that the GPT-4-based method outperforms the sentence-based method.
